cluster_information.name: Media Playback
cluster_information.description: Provides an interface for controlling Media Playback (PLAY, PAUSE, etc) on a media device such as a TV, Set-top Box, or Smart Speaker.

attributes.name: CurrentState
attributes.description: This SHALL indicate the current playback state of media.

attributes.name: StartTime
attributes.description: This SHALL indicate the start time of the media, in case the media has a fixed start time (for example, live stream or television broadcast), or null when start time does not apply to the current media.

attributes.name: Duration
attributes.description: This SHALL indicate the duration, in milliseconds, of the current media being played back or null when duration is not applicable.

attributes.name: SampledPosition
attributes.description: This SHALL indicate the position of playback (Position field) at the time (UpdateAt field) specified in the attribute.

attributes.name: PlaybackSpeed
attributes.description: This SHALL indicate the speed at which the current media is being played.

attributes.name: SeekRangeEnd
attributes.description: This SHALL indicate the furthest forward valid position to which a client MAY seek forward, in milliseconds from the start of the media.

attributes.name: SeekRangeStart
attributes.description: This SHALL indicate the earliest valid position to which a client MAY seek back, in milliseconds from start of the media.
